Title: Relates to establishing a joint commission on public transparency and sexual harassment
Summary: Establishes a joint commission on public transparency and sexual harassment to adopt, amend and rescind rules and regulations defining sexual harassment for state agencies, offices, and branches of government and develop recommendations for the uniform distribution of such definitions and policies, and to receive complaints and referrals alleging violations by certain state officials.
LawCode: Add ยง75-b, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to establishing a joint commission on public transparency and sexual harassment
